> <OLD>
>
> Tucson looks back to Big Convoy.  He was bent on going through.
>
> "We continue on, we take our chances through the portal.  Something tells me
> it's the way to go.  All right, this is it, all or nothing."
>
> With another powerful roar, he charges onward, this time, slowly extending
> his wings, feeling that the need for flight would come soon enough.  He
> could feel his limbs comming off the ground, as he extends his talons to Big
> Convoy and the others.
>
> "Those of you who can get on my back, do so now, Big Convoy, grab onto my
> talons, and hold on as tight as you can.  I sense I may need to take
> flight..  Something is driving me to fly."

<NEW>

As BIG CONVOY was nearly the same size as TUSCON, only a few inches of
hieght and a few pounds of weight seperated the two, there was no way
for TUSCON to carry him. However BREAK and MACH KICK climb on TUSCON's
back, thier combined wieght nearly half of his if not more. Even with
those two it could make for a rough flight of he had to fly.

CONVOY nodded, "Go through now! I will do what I have to do once I get
on the other side."

Keying his radio spoke into it. "We're going through the portal." He
said to LONG RACK. "I don't know how much communication we will have
on the other side." He paused meaningfully, "Get everyone home."

"But sir . . " LONG RACK responded.

"That is an order!" BIG CONVOY responded evenly.

"Yes sir." LONG RACK came back. "I read you loud and clear."

Turning back to TUSCON if he was still in the room he made shooing
motions as all around them the sounds of many booted feet could be
heard running down the halls. It would only be a matter of moments
before they were over run.

Pulling out several grenades BIG CONOY looked around the room, "Before
we go we're going to leave them a little gift!"

Letting the safety clips detatch he smiled as he saw the pins hit the
floor. He tossed them near the door, watched them bounce and then dove
through the portal!

(TAG)

- Preston
